Ndinafuulira kwa Yehova mu msauko wanga,ndipo anandivomereza.
Yehova, landitsani moyo wanga kumilomo ya mabodza,ndi kulilime lonyenga.
Mivi yakuthwa ya chiphona,ndi makala tsanya.
Tsoka ine, kuti ndili mlendo m'Meseki,kuti ndigonera m'mahema a Kedara!
Moyo wanga unakhalitsa nthawipamodzi ndi iye wakudana nao mtendere.
Ine ndikuti, Mtendere;koma polankhula ine, iwowa akuti, Nkhondo.
